name: Crystal Caveman
description:
Your girlfriend likes shiny rocks. Go find her the shiniest rock of all. Fight through hordes of monsters to the cave where shiny rocks grow.

WASD to move, mouse click or space bar to attack. Controller supported.

Made during the Ludum Dare 36 game jam.

Changelog:

v1.1: Moved health display to center of screen so it can be seen at any aspect ratio.

v1.2: Updated to most recent version of Unity. Added Mac and Linux builds.
